text: but then, the group entered a filler arc where (C1) and (C3) joined a boy band
and then, the fires of Double-Hell cosumed (C2)'s soul and (C3) had to venture below to get it back
but then, (C3) revealed (C1)... I am your father.
but suddenly, Jesus comes to challenge (C2) to a dance off
and then, due to hunger (C2) literally stole candy from a baby
but then, (C3) felt a bit sticky
but suddenly, (C3) had a epileptic seizure
but then, (C2) was infected with Space AIDs and (C1) and (C3) become microbe size and went in to kill it
and then, there was awkward sexual tension between (C2) and (C1)
but then, (C1) kept wishing the clothes hanger wasn't long enough
but then, (C3) climbed onto (C2)'s shoulders and they souted EAGLEEEEEEEEEEE!
all of the sudden, the characters were SWATted because (C1) had been streaming everything on Twitch
out of nowhere, a hawk swooped down from the sky and dropped a rabid raccoon on (C2)
that caused, (C3) to break out into tears, pulling a teddy bear out of nowhere and crying about not going back to the dark place
but suddenly, a ray of light shined down upon (C1) and they were enlightened through the ways of Cthulhu
and then, (C1) and (C3) decided to take a break from their adventure and play a game of connect four
all of the sudden, a flash mob appeared and everyone started dancing to Uptown Funk
in a flash, (C3) did an unforgivable act, and stole a balloon on free balloon day
after that, (C3) felt extremely sentimental and gave (C1) a stray puppy
but then, (C2) walked up to (C3) with a rose and asked (C3) if they had dropped it
after that, (C1) said that (C3) reminded him of (C2)'s mother
but then, (C3) realized divine intervention isn't always good
but then, (C2) found the Lady of the Lake
*but the, (C1) found the Man of the Bake
but suddenly, (C3) decided to drop it like it was hot
and then, they all realized why Genocide was a good thing
but suddenly, they realized they summoned the Four Horsemen
all of the sudden, they stumbled upon a midget orgy
after that, they decided the world is better off without some people
and then, (C3) splatted (C1) with sticky white goop
suddenly, (C1) heard the muffled sounds of children from a nearby closet
but then, (C2) was assaulted by Horsel Frisk, the Rapey Dolphin
and then, (C3)'s wife Noo Noo burst into action at the mere sight of dirty stuff
suddenly, the memories of Bill Cosby returns to (C2) as (C1) eats a 'puddin' pop'
*and then, (C2) decides to take a shortcut to the toy store...through a playground
*but then, (C1) fought against an invasion of Ebola with...bolas
meanwhile, (C1) enjoys his/her favorite past time, punting babies in the name of Mecha-Hitler
but then, (C3) became his alter-ego, Lord Snaggle-Clutch, and roundhouse kicks (C2)
and then, (C2) got decked by (C3) saying, \'X gon give it to ya!\'
and then (C2) got into an fiddle-off with the actual devil
then, during a holiday special (C2) and (C1) were revealed to be quite naughty and had to fight Krampus
*some time after (C2) cross-dressed to seduce a local crime boss to steal his money. The seduction went notably poorly
and afterward authorities arrived the group spent an uncomfortable night in jail with Bubba the Back Breaker
but then, at just the right time, (C1) finally removed the gimp suit
and, (C3) had never been so oddly aroused
and thus, race relations were sent back at least 20 years
